title: 238.41 INSURANCE.
text: The cable communications system shall carry insurance to protect the parties to the agreement from and against any and all claims, demands, actions, judgments, costs, expenses, and liabilities which may arise or result, directly or indirectly, from or by reason of the loss, injury, claim, or damage. The amount of the insurance must be agreed to by the parties to this agreement. The cable communications system shall also carry insurance to protect it from all claims under workers' compensation laws in effect that may be applicable to it. Insurance required must remain in effect for the entire term of the agreement.
